LABEL: 0x360
STRING: 「Reiri...!」

LABEL: 0x40D
STRING: 「Oh, thank God... Really...!」

LABEL: 0x440
STRING: Touri rejoiced in her sister's rescue.

LABEL: 0x462
STRING: She cradled the girl as she lay down on the floor.

LABEL: 0x549
STRING: And no one interrupted them.

LABEL: 0x612
STRING: Happiness, and peace of mind.

LABEL: 0x636
STRING: I recalled emotions that I had long forgotten.

LABEL: 0x666
STRING: How long had it been... I was feeling nostalgic even over this peaceful atmosphere.

LABEL: 0x755
STRING: The twin sisters were now finally reunited after the accident.

LABEL: 0x783
STRING: Not only Touri, but Yukari, Hiragino, and Tokiwa as well――

LABEL: 0x7BB
STRING: Everyone in the room had a cheerful expression on their faces.

LABEL: 0x87F
STRING: 「I'm so glad... You were alive after all!」

LABEL: 0x8B0
STRING: At the bottom of this dark, cold sea...

LABEL: 0x8D2
STRING: While a torrent of death surrounded us,

LABEL: 0x902
STRING: an unexpectedly warm and gentle space was created thanks to her.

LABEL: 0x95B
STRING: ――However, there was a single person left out.

LABEL: 0x991
STRING: I was the one who had rescued her.

LABEL: 0x9C1
STRING: And I...

LABEL: 0x9DB
STRING: ...Was the only one who could do nothing but stand there frozen, unable to say anything.

LABEL: 0xA70
STRING: ――What the hell was going on?

LABEL: 0xA9C
STRING: This girl...

LABEL: 0xAB6
STRING: Was Touri's sister?

LABEL: 0xBA4
STRING: 「She's really a sweet girl. She's easily misunderstood, but...」

LABEL: 0xBE4
STRING: 「She's been frail since she was little, so people tend to think of her as a gloomy girl...」

LABEL: 0xCAE
STRING: No... That was wrong...

LABEL: 0xCCC
STRING: ――That couldn't be.

LABEL: 0xCF0
STRING: I knew.

LABEL: 0xE2E
STRING: Yes, I knew that.

LABEL: 0xE56
STRING: The girl who had called Touri her sister was――

LABEL: 0xE84
STRING: 「Hikari...」

LABEL: 0xF3A
STRING: 「Where did Hikari go?」

LABEL: 0xFE1
STRING: 「Hikari...?」

LABEL: 0x106B
STRING: 「Hikari... Who's that?」

LABEL: 0x109E
STRING: 「Who――」

LABEL: 0x10E3
STRING: This was strange... What did it mean?

LABEL: 0x110D
STRING: Did I remember wrong?

LABEL: 0x112B
STRING: No, that wasn't possible.

LABEL: 0x1157
STRING: That girl,

LABEL: 0x116D
STRING: Hikari...

LABEL: 0x1183
STRING: Wasn't she Touri's sister?

LABEL: 0x1204
STRING: She... didn't know her?

LABEL: 0x122C
STRING: Why would she say that?

LABEL: 0x12BD
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x1373
STRING: The look in Touri's eyes was one of confusion.

LABEL: 0x139F
STRING: Or maybe even fear...

LABEL: 0x13D3
STRING: It didn't seem like she was lying to me.

LABEL: 0x1409
STRING: She really didn't know about Hikari, did she?

LABEL: 0x1468
STRING: What the hell was going on in this ship?

LABEL: 0x1523
STRING: 「Well, then...」

LABEL: 0x153F
STRING: 「Sorry to interrupt your emotional reunion, but could you let me see the girl for a bit?」

LABEL: 0x15B7
STRING: Hiragino stepped between myself and Touri, interrupting our conversation.

LABEL: 0x15F9
STRING: He was kneeling next to the sleeping girl's body.

LABEL: 0x1633
STRING: She didn't move an inch.

LABEL: 0x175F
STRING: It's no use. She's completely unconscious.」

LABEL: 0x178E
STRING: Hiragino wrinkled his brow.

LABEL: 0x17DD
STRING: Even though she was breathing fine, it was still possible that she was in a critical condition.

LABEL: 0x1829
STRING: But how were we supposed to make sure of that in these deep waters?

LABEL: 0x187E
STRING: 「Okay...」

LABEL: 0x189D
STRING: Hiragino moved the girl's position and took out a small device from his doctor's coat.

LABEL: 0x18F1
STRING: A syringe? No.

LABEL: 0x1915
STRING: It looked like an electronic device.

LABEL: 0x1935
STRING: It was small, about the size of a clenched fist.

LABEL: 0x1973
STRING: An electronic sound rang out when the switch was pressed.

LABEL: 0x199F
STRING: Hiragino took the sleeping girl's thin hand, took her pulse, and attached the device to her fingertip.

LABEL: 0x1AC8
STRING: 「Touri-san?」

LABEL: 0x1AE9
STRING: When Touri saw the device being fitted to her finger with an electronic sound, she let out a small voice.

LABEL: 0x1B37
STRING: Her face was pale.

LABEL: 0x1BE1
STRING: 「Oh, yeah...」

LABEL: 0x1C03
STRING: 「Sorry for doing something strange to your sister all of a sudden.」

LABEL: 0x1CA3
STRING: 「But worry not, it's nothing weird.」

LABEL: 0x1CDC
STRING: Hiragino followed up in a hurry.

LABEL: 0x1D31
STRING: Indeed―although her sister had been found, she was still unconscious, and her condition was unknown.

LABEL: 0x1D89
STRING: It was only natural for her to react that way when a strange device was attached to her in that state.

LABEL: 0x1E47
STRING: Even with Hiragino's reassurance, Touri remained silent, staring at her sister's fingertip without looking away.

LABEL: 0x1EA1
STRING: But she didn't look to be physically injured at all.

LABEL: 0x1EE1
STRING: So, that was a bit of an overreaction.

LABEL: 0x1F01
STRING: Well, I guess when you were twins, you couldn't help but feel like you were two halves of a whole.

LABEL: 0x1FA9
STRING: ――Not a moment later, the little device emitted an electronic sound again.

LABEL: 0x1FEB
STRING: Hiragino took Reiri's hand and looked down at her fingertip.

LABEL: 0x202B
STRING: The device was blinking green.

LABEL: 0x2053
STRING: Seeing this, Hiragino let out a breath as if feeling somewhat relieved.

LABEL: 0x210E
STRING: 「Your sister...」

LABEL: 0x212E
STRING: 「There seems to be some bruising from the impact...」

LABEL: 0x21D4
STRING: 「But as it stands, I'd say she's in good condition.」

LABEL: 0x220F
STRING: I see, so the only problem was her unconsciousness.

LABEL: 0x223F
STRING: However, a several-hour coma was quite possible considering the strong impact during the collision.

LABEL: 0x22D2
STRING: Similarly, I had fainted for a moment, too, before Hiragino had found me.

LABEL: 0x2322
STRING: Losing consciousness was not that alarming if you knew the reason.

LABEL: 0x236E
STRING: Her own sister, Touri, would be worried about that, but...

LABEL: 0x23A6
STRING: Apparently, Hiragino decided there was no need to investigate the cause or force her to wake up.

LABEL: 0x247D
STRING: 「Well then――」

LABEL: 0x2499
STRING: 「I'll have her stay in the emergency room for now and see what happens...」

LABEL: 0x253D
STRING: 「And――

LABEL: 0x25A2
STRING: up we go!」

LABEL: 0x25C2
STRING: Hiragino lifted Reiri with ease.

LABEL: 0x25EE
STRING: She was so light that it surprised him.

LABEL: 0x264D
STRING: Well, no wonder.

LABEL: 0x266F
STRING: She was so light that even I could carry her in my arms, weak as I was.

LABEL: 0x26AB
STRING: Why was her body like that, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x26E3
STRING: Hiragino held her tightly in his arms and looked back at Touri.

LABEL: 0x27F8
STRING: 「You should come with us too, Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x2886
STRING: 「Yeah, I'll go!」

LABEL: 0x28B2
STRING: An energetic reply.

LABEL: 0x28D4
STRING: Yes. After all, when I thought of Touri, this voice suited her best.

LABEL: 0x2908
STRING: Even though she had plenty to worry about, she had found Reiri, and her spirit was slowly being lifted.

LABEL: 0x29DB
STRING: ――Suddenly, my eyes met with Hiragino's.

LABEL: 0x2A16
STRING: 「лл-kun.」

LABEL: 0x2A33
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0x2A5A
STRING: 「You've been bruised all over too.」

LABEL: 0x2A88
STRING: 「Let's do one more check-up, shall we?」

LABEL: 0x2AE2
STRING: ...Me too?

LABEL: 0x2AFC
STRING: Hiragino's medical examination.

LABEL: 0x2B73
STRING: What that brought to mind was my first encounter with the man.

LABEL: 0x2BA7
STRING: After I had emerged from the bridge with my banged head, it was Hiragino who had done a thing like that――

LABEL: 0x2CB9
STRING: The back of my head was aching.

LABEL: 0x2CDD
STRING: Was that really a medical procedure he had performed back there...?

LABEL: 0x2D0D
STRING: Without waiting for me to answer his question, Hiragino turned on his heel and started walking.

LABEL: 0x304A
STRING: When we arrived at the emergency room, Hiragino laid Reiri down on the bed.

LABEL: 0x308A
STRING: Her slender body could not even make the bed creak.

LABEL: 0x30C8
STRING: The blanket was puffed up lightly, and Reiri showed no signs of waking up.

LABEL: 0x312D
STRING: 「Step back for a second.」

LABEL: 0x3156
STRING: The thing Hiragino brought out while saying that was a device the size of an old washing machine.

LABEL: 0x31AC
STRING: It might have looked ancient, but it was actually a state-of-the-art portable MRI machine.

LABEL: 0x328F
STRING: 「There we go.」

LABEL: 0x32AE
STRING: He turned on the device with a practiced hand and ran the scanner over Reiri's lying body.

LABEL: 0x3312
STRING: Hiragino looked at the images displayed one after another on the monitor with a stern face.

LABEL: 0x33D0
STRING: 「There doesn't seem to be any problems...」

LABEL: 0x33FF
STRING: Either that or the MRI couldn't detect them.

LABEL: 0x343A
STRING: Both of us looked down at Reiri in silence.

LABEL: 0x349C
STRING: She wasn't dead, so I shouldn't worry.

LABEL: 0x34CC
STRING: It was Yukari who had said that there was no point in worrying.

LABEL: 0x350E
STRING: She hadn't followed us to the emergency room, saying there was nothing she could help with, and had gone alone to the wheelhouse instead.

LABEL: 0x3650
STRING: 「There's something I want to confirm.」

LABEL: 0x36FA
STRING: Saying only that, she had left... Just what was it she wanted to check?

LABEL: 0x3752
STRING: That was why she wasn't here in the emergency room with Hiragino, me, Touri, and...

LABEL: 0x3825
STRING: 「Oh my. They don't look much alike at all for twins.」

LABEL: 0x385C
STRING: Tokiwa was leaning over Reiri on the bed, showing no restraint.

LABEL: 0x3923
STRING: 「Is this what they call fraternal twins?」

LABEL: 0x39D9
STRING: 「Hey, that kid is hurt. Settle down a bit.」

LABEL: 0x3A70
STRING: Tokiwa had also made her way to the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x3A9E
STRING: We couldn't leave her by herself, and having her follow Yukari to the wheelhouse seemed out of the question.

LABEL: 0x3B12
STRING: So, that's why we brought her along... I think.

LABEL: 0x3B54
STRING: I was certain that she had been the most important person when it came to the rescue operation of Reiri,

LABEL: 0x3C0E
STRING: yet she was now being treated like a misbehaving five-year-old.

LABEL: 0x3C41
STRING: Not paying attention to Hiragino's remarks,

LABEL: 0x3CB4
STRING: Tokiwa stared at%Nthe long-unconscious Reiri from various angles.

LABEL: 0x3D09
STRING: She was so enthusiastic that I wondered how long she would keep it up.

LABEL: 0x3DC9
STRING: However, she seemed to lose interest in Reiri after a while,

LABEL: 0x3E24
STRING: and suddenly wandered toward Hiragino's desk.

LABEL: 0x3E7F
STRING: Seeing that, Hiragino started to panic.

LABEL: 0x3F8A
STRING: 「Hey, that's my personal stuff. Wait――」

LABEL: 0x4031
STRING: 「Hey, Hiragino-sensei!」

LABEL: 0x40D3
STRING: 「Could you stop calling me "sensei," Touri-kun――」

LABEL: 0x4184
STRING: 「Well... Then, Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x4220
STRING: 「Can you give this to Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x42E8
STRING: Seeing what Touri took from her pouch, Hiragino's eyes turned serious.

LABEL: 0x436E
STRING: Peering from the side, I saw a small medical syringe and an ampule.

LABEL: 0x43BC
STRING: The label was lined with detailed English letters.

LABEL: 0x44C1
STRING: 「Touri-kun, this is――」

LABEL: 0x44F6
STRING: 「It's the medicine that Reiri always takes, okay?」

LABEL: 0x4529
STRING: After accepting the medicine, Hiragino looked at it carefully... and frowned.

LABEL: 0x4640
STRING: 「...What the hell is this...?」

LABEL: 0x4675
STRING: 「? What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x46A6
STRING: 「It's the first time I've seen...」

LABEL: 0x4789
STRING: Hiragino called out to Tokiwa, who looked to be in the middle of opening all the drawers she could find.

LABEL: 0x47E4
STRING: 「Tokiwa-kun.」

LABEL: 0x48CD
STRING: 「What is it, Sousuke-san?」

LABEL: 0x4902
STRING: 「I told you to drop the "sensei"...

LABEL: 0x4980
STRING: Hey, what with the way%Nyou're addressing me?」

LABEL: 0x49B7
STRING: 「I'm afraid I can't just drop the honorific.」

LABEL: 0x49EE
STRING: 「...Well, whatever. Do you happen to know what this medicine is?」

LABEL: 0x4A27
STRING: He handed one of the ampoules to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x4ADC
STRING: 「Dear me...」

LABEL: 0x4AFB
STRING: Tokiwa held it up to the light between her fingertips after receiving it.

LABEL: 0x4B4B
STRING: It looked like she was used to doing that... Well, this was Tokiwa, after all.

LABEL: 0x4B89
STRING: It looked dangerous, so I was getting a bit nervous.

LABEL: 0x4BD4
STRING: 「I've seen something similar.」

LABEL: 0x4C17
STRING: 「Really?!」

LABEL: 0x4C31
STRING: 「That medicine...」

LABEL: 0x4C4D
STRING: 「Could it be dangerous?」

LABEL: 0x4CF4
STRING: 「You say the strangest things, don't you, Sousuke-san?」

LABEL: 0x4D2A
STRING: 「All medicine is dangerous, more or less.」

LABEL: 0x4D85
STRING: What she was saying was absolutely true, but for some reason, it annoyed me to think that I had to hear it from her mouth.

LABEL: 0x4E62
STRING: 「But... yes.」

LABEL: 0x4EF4
STRING: 「If she's taking this regularly, it's better to simply administer it obediently, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0x4F51
STRING: That was an unusually reasonable opinion for Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x4F87
STRING: But Hiragino, as a doctor, seemed to have a problem with it.

LABEL: 0x5007
STRING: Getting impatient with Hiragino, who was still playing with the ampoules in his hand, Touri called out to him.

LABEL: 0x50DA
STRING: 「If you don't hurry, Reiri will――」

LABEL: 0x5102
STRING: 「Please, Hiragino-san!」

LABEL: 0x5135
STRING: 「...Fine.」

LABEL: 0x517D
STRING: With the two girls urging him to do it, Hiragino took the medicine to her.

LABEL: 0x51BF
STRING: It was probably a fair decision.

LABEL: 0x51DF
STRING: It was possible that Reiri's unconsciousness was due to her not taking this medicine.

LABEL: 0x522F
STRING: After skillfully administering her the medicine, Hiragino stared at the empty ampoule in his hand for a moment.

LABEL: 0x52B3
STRING: He tucked the empty ampoule into his coat pocket instead of the trash can.

LABEL: 0x53C8
STRING: 「...How many of these are there?」

LABEL: 0x5479
STRING: 「Ah, let's see...」

LABEL: 0x5507
STRING: 「The one's in here are all of them.」

LABEL: 0x5536
STRING: Touri took out her pouch from earlier.

LABEL: 0x5562
STRING: Looking inside, I could see many of the same ampoules.

LABEL: 0x55C9
STRING: 「There's no need for this many, but...」

LABEL: 0x5665
STRING: 「I was in a hurry, so I ended up bringing a lot.」

LABEL: 0x5714
STRING: 「...Do you mind giving me one of them?」

LABEL: 0x57C7
STRING: 「Sure!」

LABEL: 0x57E6
STRING: Touri handed one of the ampoules to Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x58D0
STRING: 「Sousuke-san, this is serious!」

LABEL: 0x58FB
STRING: 「The drawers won't close!」

LABEL: 0x59A0
STRING: 「Aaaah, what are you doing now?!」

LABEL: 0x5A0B
STRING: Hiragino tucked the ampoule he received into his chest pocket and ran to his desk.

LABEL: 0x5A5F
STRING: The desk was in a messy state.

LABEL: 0x5A95
STRING: ...It was rather neat and tidy when I came here earlier during my search...

LABEL: 0x5AE7
STRING: And sure enough, the culprit, Tokiwa, was no longer there. She was now mindlessly flipping through a calendar on the wall.

LABEL: 0x5BB1
STRING: 「We're already over a quarter into the 21st century...」

LABEL: 0x5BEF
STRING: 「Don't you think days of the week and dates are eccentric?」

LABEL: 0x5C2E
STRING: 「What are you talking about――」

LABEL: 0x5C61
STRING: A quarter of a century... Well, it was the year 2033 now, I guess.

LABEL: 0x5CAB
STRING: Hiragino opened his mouth to reproach her but quickly gave up and began to clean up the desk by himself.

LABEL: 0x5D10
STRING: 「Good grief...」

LABEL: 0x5D33
STRING: His grumbling back seemed somewhat miserable as he tidied up his desk.

LABEL: 0x5D91
STRING: He was the oldest among us and a doctor we should be relying on, but...

LABEL: 0x5DCF
STRING: It seemed like he was no match for Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x5E0D
STRING: Hiragino, who had been leading us with a stern face a moment ago, seemed now, funnily enough, at peace.

LABEL: 0x5EBA
STRING: Yes, peace.

LABEL: 0x5ED4
STRING: We were in the depths of the sea, the power unit had been destroyed, and there was no way to contact the surface.

LABEL: 0x5F1A
STRING: Our problems had piled up, but still...

LABEL: 0x5F48
STRING: I suddenly realized.

LABEL: 0x5F62
STRING: After escaping the life-and-death tension we'd just experienced, we had definitely regained a certain sense of peace.

LABEL: 0x5FCC
STRING: ――An illusion.

LABEL: 0x5FE4
STRING: Yes.

LABEL: 0x5FF8
STRING: We were all well aware that this was only an illusion.

LABEL: 0x6040
STRING: No matter how much we tried to look away, a number of riddles were lying behind this temporary tranquility.

LABEL: 0x6107
STRING: Why had Reiri been lying collapsed inside that warehouse?

LABEL: 0x613B
STRING: Why had she been on the first floor at a time when everyone else was gathered on the observation deck?

LABEL: 0x618B
STRING: And what did she want with the warehouse?

LABEL: 0x61C3
STRING: Who exactly was Reiri? And――

LABEL: 0x62A0
STRING: That girl who had called herself a poet...

LABEL: 0x62C8
STRING: Hikari―why had she said that she was Touri's sister?

LABEL: 0x6302
STRING: Touri herself said that she didn't know Hikari.

LABEL: 0x6336
STRING: I didn't know that much about Touri, but... she didn't seem to be lying.

LABEL: 0x63A0
STRING: And...

LABEL: 0x63D9
STRING: Where had she disappeared to?

LABEL: 0x6405
STRING: She had definitely said she was going to the front section at the time, but she was yet to be found.

LABEL: 0x645B
STRING: Did she――

LABEL: 0x64D2
STRING: Did she really exist at all?

LABEL: 0x650A
STRING: I was the only one who had seen her, right?

LABEL: 0x653C
STRING: I couldn't even deny this delusional line of thinking.

LABEL: 0x6570
STRING: And that wasn't all.

LABEL: 0x65ED
STRING: There was nothing on the sea floor... The radar hadn't detected "that" at all.

LABEL: 0x6639
STRING: The scale of the accident was too great to be a mere collision with the sea floor.

LABEL: 0x6677
STRING: And the probe that had disappeared...

LABEL: 0x6707
STRING: ――What the hell was going on?

LABEL: 0x6746
STRING: 「...лл-san... Hey, лл-san!」

LABEL: 0x6832
STRING: 「――Whuh?」

LABEL: 0x684C
STRING: When Touri grabbed me by the shoulders, I finally realized I was being called.

LABEL: 0x6890
STRING: I gave an unnatural reaction due to our close proximity.

LABEL: 0x68C8
STRING: I had to hurry up and get myself together...

LABEL: 0x6967
STRING: 「What do you mean, "Whuh?"」

LABEL: 0x698B
STRING: 「I was worried since you looked so troubled, but you didn't seem to hear me at all.」

LABEL: 0x6A45
STRING: 「Do you feel sick?」

LABEL: 0x6A6A
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x6A8A
STRING: Why was I apologizing...

LABEL: 0x6B22
STRING: Touri giggled.

LABEL: 0x6B7E
STRING: 「Sorry to interrupt, but...」

LABEL: 0x6BA9
STRING: I turned around and...

LABEL: 0x6C82
STRING: There was Hiragino,

LABEL: 0x6D12
STRING: who had Tokiwa%Nlocked down.

LABEL: 0x6D45
STRING: What the hell were these guys doing...?

LABEL: 0x6E1B
STRING: 「As for Reiri-kun's condition, it seems she's just "asleep."」

LABEL: 0x6E9D
STRING: 「Then――」

LABEL: 0x6F34
STRING: 「Yeah, she'll wake up in due time.」

LABEL: 0x6FC6
STRING: 「...But it would be best to avoid forcing her awake.」

LABEL: 0x7008
STRING: 「You may be worried, Touri-kun, but you can't stay here forever.」

LABEL: 0x7054
STRING: 「So, let's all wait for Reiri-kun to wake up.」

LABEL: 0x70C7
STRING: 「We'll have to join up with Yukari-san too.」

LABEL: 0x7107
STRING: 「Yea... That's right.」

LABEL: 0x7127
STRING: I tried to check the time on my watch but then remembered that it was broken.

LABEL: 0x7185
STRING: The clock on the wall――

LABEL: 0x71A3
STRING: It had already been half an hour since we parted ways with Yukari.

LABEL: 0x7254
STRING: 「Come on, let's go, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x7302
STRING: 「Okaay.」

LABEL: 0x7386
STRING: Hiragino dragged Tokiwa along, and she followed him meekly.

LABEL: 0x73CA
STRING: Even Touri, who had been looking worried even after Reiri was found, blurted out a laugh seeing that.

LABEL: 0x7440
STRING: It must have been a carefully thought-out effort to ease the atmosphere.

LABEL: 0x7488
STRING: Yes, it was all a targeted action.

LABEL: 0x74B4
STRING: So, being yelled at for groping Hiragino's chest and arms must as well be――

LABEL: 0x7574
STRING: 「I told you, hands off!」

LABEL: 0x75B9
STRING: 「Don't be like that. Just a little more!」

LABEL: 0x7604
STRING: Wow.

LABEL: 0x761A
STRING: That was sexual harassment...

LABEL: 0x7640
STRING: If Hiragino decided to sue, he'd win for sure.

LABEL: 0x7672
STRING: However, Tokiwa's hands persisted...

LABEL: 0x76B2
STRING: I was creeped out and looked back at Touri.

LABEL: 0x76EC
STRING: Her expression――

LABEL: 0x77A2
STRING: She was dumbfounded.

LABEL: 0x77EB
STRING: I stood casually between the two of them and Touri.

LABEL: 0x781F
STRING: Tokiwa was Tokiwa, after all.

LABEL: 0x7849
STRING: There was no way she'd be putting much thought into her actions.

LABEL: 0x7871
STRING: I was foolish to expect that she would...
